module files

cpp {`
    #include <stdio.h>

    #include <fcntl.h>
    #include <sys/stat.h>
`}

FileInfo {
    __name:string
    __size:number
    __exist:bool
    this(n:string) {
        __name = n
        cpp {`
            int fd = open(field___name.value,O_RDONLY);
            if(fd>-1) {
                field___exist = fd>-1;
                struct stat s;
                fstat(fd,&s);
                field___size = s.st_size;
            }
        `}
    }
    size():number {
        return __size
    }

    exist():bool {
        return __exist
    }
}

FileReader {
    __fp:number
    __name:string
    __has:bool
    open(name:string) {
        __name = name
        cpp {`
            field___fp  = open(field___name.value,O_RDONLY);
        `}
        __has = true
    }

    readNumber():number{
        n:number
        cpp {`
            read(field___fp,&var_n, sizeof(var_n));              
        `}
        return n
    }
    read(size:number):string {
        s:string
        if __has==false {
            return s
        }
        cpp {`
            char buf[param_size];
            size_t nread;
            nread = read(field___fp, buf, param_size);   
            buf[nread] = '\0';     
            var_s = buf;
        `}
        return s
    }
    readLine():string {
        s:string
        cpp {`
            char buf[128];
            char c;
            int i = 0,nread;
            while((nread =read(field___fp, &c, 1))>0) {
                if(c=='\r' || c=='\n') {
                    buf[i] = '\0';                   
                    var_s = buf;
                    break;
                }
                buf[i] = c;
                i++;
            }                       
            if(nread<1)
                field___has=false;                
        `}
        return s
    }
    has():bool {
        return __has
    }

    position():number {
        ret:number
        cpp {`
            var_ret = lseek(field___fp,0,SEEK_CUR);
        `}
        return ret
    }

    goto(pos:number) {
        cpp {`
            lseek(field___fp,param_pos,SEEK_SET);
        `}
    }

    close():bool {
        ret:bool
        cpp {`
            var_ret = close(field___fp)>-1;
        `}
        return ret
    }
}

FileAppender {
    __fp:number
    __name:string
    open(name:string) {
        __name = name
        cpp {`
            field___fp  = open(field___name.value,O_APPEND|O_CREAT|O_WRONLY, 0644);
            if(field___fp<1) {
                fprintf(stderr, "New File Error: %d\n", errno);
            }
        `}
    }
    append(s:string) {
        cpp {`
            write(field___fp,param_s.value,param_s.len);
        `}
    }

    close():bool {
        ret:bool
        cpp {`
            var_ret = close(field___fp)>-1;
        `}
        return ret
    }
}

FileWriter {
    __fp:number
    __name:string
    open(name:string) {
        __name = name
        cpp {`
            field___fp  = creat(field___name.value, 0644);
            if(field___fp<1) {
                fprintf(stderr, "New File Error: %d\n", errno);
            }
        `}
    }
    write(n:number) {
        cpp {`
           write(field___fp,&param_n,sizeof(long));        
        `}
    }
    write(s:string) {
        cpp {`
            write(field___fp,param_s.value,param_s.len);
        `}
    }

    position():number {
        ret:number
        cpp {`
            var_ret = lseek(field___fp,0,SEEK_CUR);
        `}
        return ret
    }

    goto(pos:number) {
        cpp {`

        `}
    }

    }
}

open(n:string):FileReader {
    f:FileReader
    f.open(n)
    return f
}

new(n:string):FileWriter {
    f:FileWriter
    f.open(n)
    return f
}

append(n:string):FileAppender {
    f:FileAppender
    f.open(n)
    return f
}

}
